lyric: 作词 : 尹纯青Eyn/Applebeetle/宫奇Gon(HOYO-MiX)
作曲 : 宫奇Gon(HOYO-MiX)
All over the street, shining the old neon.
translation: 整个街区，老旧的霓虹灯依旧闪烁。

lyric: In endless rain, what have you had become.
translation: 在无尽的雨中，你已经变成了什么样子。

lyric: How many times, I wanna wake you up.
translation: 曾经有许多次，我想将你唤醒。

lyric: Given you up, go up on my own way alone.
translation: 如今我已将你放弃，独自继续上路。

lyric: Who we are? How far we've gone?
translation: 我们是谁？我们已经走了多远？

lyric: Let us heal the misery and
translation: 让我们去治愈一切苦难，

lyric: Plant the seed we ever promised.
translation: 播下希望的种子，像我们承诺的那样。

lyric: Time is up! Go grab your arms!
translation: 时间紧迫！拿起武器！

lyric: No matter how hard we have been
translation: 无论我们经历了多少艰难困苦，

lyric: We shall fight for-E-VER!
translation: 我们必须一直斗争下去！

lyric: I hear it from no one,
translation: 我在冥冥之中听到一个声音，

lyric: It occur to me the old world.
translation: 让我想起那个旧世界。

lyric: It may have said no word,
translation: 他虽不曾言明，

lyric: But I have to keep knowing:
translation: 但我却时刻铭记：

lyric: I hear it from no one,
translation: 我在冥冥之中听到一个声音，

lyric: It occur to me the old world.
translation: 让我想起那个旧世界。

lyric: It may have said no word,
translation: 他虽不曾言明，

lyric: But I have to keep knowing:
translation: 但我却时刻铭记：
